channel.title: Computer Science on LC-Research
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Science on LC-Research

item.title: My First Glide App
item.description: Over the years, I have acquired a bucketload of electronic gadgets. Many of these carried built in batteries that needed frequent charging. Only a few of these gadgets are in regular use. Many sit in shelves, sometimes even months without any use. To much of my dismay, a few of these silently died in shelves due to completely drained batteries. After loosing a fair amount of beloved gadgets, I finally decided to have some control over the charging business.

item.title: Getting Rid of ._ and .DS_Store Files
item.description: You may be a Windows user who received a bunch of folders from a work colleague who is using a Mac. Or you may be frequently sharing files between a Mac and a Windows computer. Or you may be copying files from your Mac to USB sticks. Whatever the use case, you must have encountered the mystical and annoying ._ files. What exactly are these files? How do you get rid of them?
